official_title: A bill to authorize appropriations for the ocean related activities of the National Science Foundation for Fiscal year 1979, and for other purposes.
short_title: National Science Foundation Ocean Program Authorization Act

summary.text: National Science Foundation Ocean Program Authorization Act - Authorizes appropriations to the National Science Foundation for certain ocean related activities for fiscal year 1979.

titles.title: National Science Foundation Ocean Program Authorization Act
A bill to authorize appropriations for the ocean related activities of the National Science Foundation for Fiscal year 1979, and for other purposes.
